video.title: Bernard
video.synopsis: Join Bernard, the polar bear without fur, as he leaves his frigid homeland to travel the world, play sports and have comical adventures.

episodes.synopsis: Bernard tackles the gym, golf, ice climbing, a swing, a security guard, a vending machine, a diving board, television, hitchhiking and skydiving.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Bernard deals with a theme park, the countryside, flight, a flying saucer, intruders, basketball, bowling, tae kwon do and scuba diving.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Bernard runs into trouble with doors, the museum, street racing, a desert island, baseball, a car, a medallion, a moth and a bull.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Bernard contends with the North Pole, a package, sleepwalking, a pizza, a unicycle, a motorboat, a prisoner, a supermarket, a mosquito and an oasis.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Bernard deals with treasure, a window cleaner, a marathon, a fumigator, a UFO, a little dog, a storm, a robot and more.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Bernard deals with a vacuum cleaner, another day in the country, football, a fossil, boxing, a little dog, a magic lamp, the Olympic torch and more.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Bernard saves Eva and has fun with ice cream, fishing, a bridge, a balloon, an elevator, a kite and more.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Bernard contends with billiards, the bullring, boomerangs, a paper boy, scuba diving, a factory, ice skating, a skateboard and more.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Bernard encounters an orchestra, a carnivorous plant, a magician, an apple tree, a cook, a building site, a lawnmower, a photo booth and more.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Bernard takes on the zoo, boy scouts, Christmas, birthdays, an office, a spa, an amusement park and more.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Bernard investigates wallpaper, an amusement park, a traffic light, a leak, table tennis, aerobics, swimming, windsurfing, skiing and more.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Bernard tries handball, the hammer throw, badminton, marathon running, fencing, skiing, pole vaulting, the javelin throw and weightlifting.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Bernard takes on archery, karate, paddle tennis, sports journalism, race walking, motor racing, chess, goal ball, basketball and indoor football.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Bernard has a go at triathlons, high jumping, dressage, rhythmic gymnastics, marathons, rugby, sprinting, snowboarding, tennis and hockey.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Furless Bernard the polar bear leaves his frigid homeland to travel the world, but bumbles through his run-ins with civilization.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Bernard tries his hand at canoeing, paragliding, the long jump, basketball, cycling and sailing.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Bernard visits a theme park; Zack tries to cross Bernard's log bridge; Bernard wants to fly in a balloon; a slow elevator tests Bernard's patience.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Bernard flies a kite; finding money tests Bernard's honesty; Bernard tries to beat Zack at billiards; Bernard dreams of becoming a great skater.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Bernard learns the importance of tickets; Bernard and Zack throw boomerangs; a dog tries to thwart Bernard's paper route; Bernard loses his ship key.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Bernard works in a factory; Bernard skates on thin ice; Zack's new skateboard makes Bernard want one; an accident makes Eva angry at Bernard.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Bernard has fun with an orchestra's musical instruments; a strange plant disturbs snack time; Zack and Bernard challenge each other's magic skill.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Bernard finds a special coin; Bernard and Lloyd enter a cooking contest; Bernard leaves Lloyd to work alone; Bernard has trouble mowing the lawn.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Eva inspires Bernard to try opera singing; Bernard finds a photo booth; Bernard visits the zoo; a spaceship takes Bernard to the moon.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Bernard shows Lloyd how a scout puts up a tent; Bernard's TV isn't working; Bernard plays Santa Claus; Bernard's picnic is anything but peaceful.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Bernard's picnic is interrupted; Bernard starts a new office job; a spa causes more work than rest for Bernard; the friends visit an amusement park.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Bernard tries to hang his new picture; Lloyd avoids a roller coaster ride; Bernard loses his patience while driving; Bernard tries to fix a leak.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Bernard looks for a table tennis partner; Eva leads Bernard's aerobics class; Lloyd interrupts Bernard's day at the pool; Bernard learns to windsurf.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Bernard visits an Olympic stadium; a snow skiing trip goes wrong; Bernard has trouble learning a new sport, including handball and hammer throwing.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Zack and Bernard play badminton; a marathon race makes Bernard thirsty; Bernard and Lloyd have a fencing duel; Bernard won't return Lloyd's ball.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Bernard is jealous of Lloyd's skiing skills; Bernard tries pole vaulting; judging a javelin throwing contest proves hazardous; Bernard visits a gym.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Bernard challenges Eva's archery and karate skills, confuses tennis with paddle tennis, and works as a reporter covering the Olympics.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Zack tries to get Bernard out of the house; Bernard, Eva and Zack have a car race; Bernard and Lloyd play chess; Eva teaches Bernard a new sport.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Bernard wants to play in the basketball final; Zack and Bernard play soccer; Bernard challenges Lloyd to a triathlon; Bernard attempts the high jump.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Bernard rides a horse, films Eva's gymnastics competition for TV, tries too hard to win a race, and plays rugby with Zack.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Bernard hopes to race at the Olympic stadium; Eva and Bernard try snowboarding; Bernard gets bored as a ball boy; Bernard plays hockey with Lloyd.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Bernard hopes to train his team; Zack and Bernard are shipwrecked; Bernard tries to fix motorcycles; Zack and Bernard work at the Olympic stadium.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Bernard tries gymnastics; Bernard and his friends play tennis; Lloyd's skill at wheelchair basketball inspires Bernard; Bernard takes judo lessons.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Someone cheats during the walking race; Bernard and Zack ride mountain bikes; Zack takes Bernard kayaking; Bernard tries hang gliding.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Bernard and Lloyd maintain the long-jump pit; Bernard and Zack play basketball; the friends race bicycles; Bernard lacks the wind to go sailing.
episodes.title: Episode 39
